BasicInfo.short: Buxfer is online money management software for personal finance, account aggregation, budgeting, bill reminders and forecasting.

Products.name: Buxfer Facebook Widget
Products.description: Buxfer's facebook widget brings its money management system to a wider audience of people frustrated with their IOUs.
